segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, I can't help but worry about what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full to the brim, water cascading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That poor woman is oblivious, standing right in the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress and apron will be soaked if she doesn't notice soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children, climbing on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretched so far; one wrong move and he'll fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just egging him on, reaching for cookies too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's slippery now with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I imagine the crash if the stool tips backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets might get damaged from the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races just watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
